main.content: Schoola has been created with students in mind. It enables the building of an engaged community and the rapprochement of students with the school. It all will make your school life better!

1.header: Make an appointment with school psychologist!
1.content: Just right now you can fast & easy make an appointment, then he will help you with your problems in any moment.

2.content: Schoola allows quick and easy, and most importantly anonymous access to school spotted for students in one place. Attention! The information posted there will not be available to teachers!!

3.content: Our application allows you to add advertisements as well as various types of questions. Need a phone charger? Do you want to borrow PLN 5 from someone? No problem write it on the student notice board!

4.content: Thanks to Schoola technology, you will meet new people in the school based on your interests. Never before has it been easier to meet a friend or colleague with similar interests!

5.content: The most necessary information within your electronic journal is now available in one place! You are able to check what you need quickly and hassle-free. In addition, the option of automatic learning planning will allow you to learn even easier for a quiz or test.
